name: Eternal Space Battles
description:
Eternal Space Battles is a classic wave-based side-scrolling shooter with bullet hell elements.

- Storm into space battles against more than 20 types of enemies, plus challenging bosses.
- Buy new ships and upgrade them to beat your high scores!
- Complete missions and advance through game levels to earn points and cash!
- More than 50 Steam achievements of varying difficulty.


Earth is under attack by alien invaders. The United Earth Forces' High Command has tasked 3 superior battle spaceships, equipped with the latest in human technology, with defeating the aliens' armada. Take control of your ship, and teach that alien scum a lesson! The fate of the universe rests in your hands!
